content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://info.epam.com/benefits.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Benefits Navigator”\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a simple and easy-to-use website which allows you to quickly and efficiently find information about all the offers and benefits the company provides. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The “Benefits Navigator” has become a part of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://info.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Infoportal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". To learn about benefits, you need to open the “Company” tab on the Infoportal and then select Benefits Navigator, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://info.epam.com/benefits\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://info.epam.com/benefits\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The site will automatically open to the city where you work. However, the location can be changed by clicking on the tab with the name of your city at the top of the site (if you're interested in using benefits on a business trip to another city or country, for example). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the left panel, you can choose from a number of categories: Corporate Programs, Health, Family Care, Sport & Fitness, Office & Home, Education, Food, Auto, Beauty, Travel, Entertainment, Other.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Start searching for corporate benefits today with Benefits Navigator.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
